argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hashgval.1 | |- G = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> ( x + 1 ) ) , 0 ) |` _om ) |
| 2 |  | hashkf.2 | |- K = ( G o. card ) |

| 8 |  | #P_cardf2 | |- card : { y | E. x e. On x ~~ y } --> On |

| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_ax-mp | |- Fun card |

| 12 | 7, 10, 11 | #P_mp2an | |- Fun ( G o. card ) |

| 18 | 10, 17 | #P_mpbi | |- card Fn dom card |
| 19 |  | #P_elpreima | |- ( card Fn dom card -> ( y e. ( `' card " _om ) <-> ( y e. dom card /\ ( card ` y ) e. _om ) ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( y e. ( `' card " _om ) <-> ( y e. dom card /\ ( card ` y ) e. _om ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_id | |- ( ( card ` y ) e. _om -> ( card ` y ) e. _om ) |
| 22 |  | #P_cardid2 | |- ( y e. dom card -> ( card ` y ) ~~ y ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_ensymd | |- ( y e. dom card -> y ~~ ( card ` y ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_breq2 | |- ( x = ( card ` y ) -> ( y ~~ x <-> y ~~ ( card ` y ) ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( ( card ` y ) e. _om /\ y ~~ ( card ` y ) ) -> E. x e. _om y ~~ x ) |

| 28 | 26, 27 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( y e. dom card /\ ( card ` y ) e. _om ) -> y e. Fin ) |
| 29 |  | #P_finnum | |- ( y e. Fin -> y e. dom card ) |
| 30 |  | #P_ficardom | |- ( y e. Fin -> ( card ` y ) e. _om ) |
| 31 | 29, 30 | #P_jca | |- ( y e. Fin -> ( y e. dom card /\ ( card ` y ) e. _om ) ) |

| 33 | 20, 32 | #P_bitri | |- ( y e. ( `' card " _om ) <-> y e. Fin ) |
| 34 | 33 | #P_eqriv | |- ( `' card " _om ) = Fin |
| 35 | 13, 16, 34 | #P_3eqtri | |- dom ( G o. card ) = Fin |

| 37 | 12, 35, 36 | #P_mpbir2an | |- ( G o. card ) Fn Fin |
| 38 | 2 | #P_fneq1i | |- ( K Fn Fin <-> ( G o. card ) Fn Fin ) |
| 39 | 37, 38 | #P_mpbir | |- K Fn Fin |
| 40 | 2 | #P_fveq1i | |- ( K ` y ) = ( ( G o. card ) ` y ) |
| 41 |  | #P_fvco | |- ( ( Fun card /\ y e. dom card ) -> ( ( G o. card ) ` y ) = ( G ` ( card ` y ) ) ) |

| 43 | 40, 42 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( y e. Fin -> ( K ` y ) = ( G ` ( card ` y ) ) ) |

| 49 | 43, 48 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( y e. Fin -> ( K ` y ) e. NN0 ) |
| 50 | 49 | #P_rgen | |- A. y e. Fin ( K ` y ) e. NN0 |
| 51 |  | #P_ffnfv | |- ( K : Fin --> NN0 <-> ( K Fn Fin /\ A. y e. Fin ( K ` y ) e. NN0 ) ) |
